description:
Beat the crowds to your favourite picnic spot or lookout. The Bravada 2 has the feel of a sneaker with the performance of a hiker, for lightweight comfort and traction on your local trails. A stretch achilles collar reduces hot spots around your ankle, and Quantum Grip™ outsoles inspires confidence on the most technical trails.

  • Lightweight mesh upper is highly breathable to keep feet cool and comfortable
  • NXT lined footbed cover for odour prevention
  • Stretch collar with an attached tongue provides comfort while keeping debris out
  • EVA midsole provides stability and cushioning
  • Moulded nylon arch shank with rock plate for added protection
  • Sticky Quamtum Grip™ rubber outsole has 5mm lugs for durable traction
name: Merrell Bravada 2 Light Trail Shoes - Women's
